name: YellowFeverTestsForYellowFeverVirusNucleicAcid
title: Yellow Fever (Tests for yellow fever virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Yellow Fever Virus Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Yellow fever virus ns5 gene, RNA;  

LOINC search:  ‘yellow fever virus nucleic’),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Yellow fever virus ns5 gene [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
Yellow fever virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
Yellow fever virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
Yellow fever virus RNA [Presence] in Specimen by NAA with probe detection
